  <description>
    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Eigenschaften von Salzen</string>
            <string language="en">Characteristics of salts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caractéristiques des sels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Características dos sais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteristiche dei sali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτηριστικά των αλάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Características de sales</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Arbeitsblatt zu den Eigenschaften von Salz: Salze sind fest und spröde, wasserlöslich, schmelzbar, und als Schmelze stromleitend. Vier Fragenkomplexe, darunter beinhaltet eine einen Versuch.</string>
            <string language="en">Worksheet on the characteristics of salt: Salts are firm and brittle, water-soluble, fusible and conductive when molten. Four blocks of questions one including an experiment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Salz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Kristall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Ionengitter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Lösung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Crystal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Ion lattices</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau sur les caractéristiques du sel : 
Les sels sont fermes et fragiles, hydrosolubles, fusibles et 
conducteurs si fondus. Quatre blocs des questions une comprenant
une expérience.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha nas características do sal: Os sais 
são firmes e frágeis, water-soluble, fundíveis e condutores quando 
derretidos. Quatro blocos das perguntas uma including uma 
experiência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro sulle caratteristiche di sale: 
I sali sono costanti e fragili, solubili in acqua, fusibili e 
conduttivi una volta fusi. Quattro blocchi delle domande una 
compreso un esperimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας στα χαρακτηριστικά του άλατος: Τα
άλατα είναι σταθερά και εύθραυστα, υδροδιαλυτά, τηκτά και 
αγώγιμα όταν λειωμένα. Τέσσερις ομάδες δεδομένων των 
ερωτήσεων μια συμπεριλαμβανομένου ενός πειράματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hoja de trabajo en las características de la sal:
Las sales son firmes y quebradizas, solubles en agua, fusibles y
conductoras cuando son fundidas. Cuatro bloques de las preguntas
una incluyendo un experimento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cristal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trellis d'ion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cristal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lattices do íon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Solução</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
